title: Banks need to be cautious with 3rd-party vendors: RBI's Swaminathan
description: Speaking at a convention organised by the International Association of Deposit Insurers, RBI deputy governor J Swaminathan called upon banks to exercise caution to guard them against potential vulnerabilities while working with third-party vendors. He also urged deposit insurers to tie insurance premiums to the level of risk posed by individual financial institutions.
